## ANGLR\_EXCEPTION\_EXTENDERS variable

Injection token used for injecting multiple AnglrExceptionExtender

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ANGLR_EXCEPTION_EXTENDERS: InjectionToken<AnglrExceptionExtender[]>
```
